com.betfair.cougar.core.impl.logging

Class CougarLog4JBootstrap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.betfair.cougar.core.impl.logging.CougarLog4JBootstrap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogBootstrap

    public class CougarLog4JBootstrap
extends Object
implements LogBootstrap
    CougarLog4JBootstrap class is used to initialise the log4j's default appender for the RootLogger. Users can override this class, and should if they don't want to use log4j, or their implementation already has a default appender configured for the RootLogger. If you want to initialise something other than log4j, then initialise cougar.core.log.bootstrap.class System variable to point to your implementation
